lead_paragraph: One horse racing track said it hopes to begin taking sports bets on Sunday, less than a week after the state government announced that such enterprises would no longer be illegal in New Jersey.

headline.main: New Jersey Track May Start Sports Betting Sunday
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Track May Start Sports Betting Sunday
